贖價.definition: price paid to redeem an object; (religion) price paid to redeem sb; ransom

贖罪.definition: to atone for one's crime; to buy freedom from punishment; redemption; atonement

贖罪日.definition: Yom Kippur or Day of Atonement (Jewish holiday)

贖罪日戰爭.definition: the Yom Kippur war of October 1973 between Israel and her Arab neighbors
